events.text: Oh I'm so glat I've found you! You must help me!
I'm running out of energy!!! There are some energy pots scattered around here. But some evil people won't let me get to them.
There's no time for questions. You have to kill them so I can refill my batteries before it's too late!
What are you waiting for?! Let's go! Do I seriously have to tell you to walk with W A S D, and shoot with a click on your mouse???
